data.prayer: Father, convict the 39,422 believers in Dubai to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dubai, United Arab Emirates
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Dubai, United Arab Emirates that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Dubai that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Dubai against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Baloch, Southern people might believe through him.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Dubai, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Over 93.67 percent of the people of Dubai are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.section_summary:
the state of Dubai, United Arab Emirates has a population of 3,331,000.

We estimate Dubai has 39,422 people who might know Jesus, 171,383 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,120,195 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 84 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Dubai to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.
